rooms.name: Tatooine
rooms.description: You are on Tatooine, a desert planet isolated from the galaxy

items.itemDescription: Use these keys to fly your spaceship across planets

rooms.name: Jabba's Cave
rooms.description: You are in Jabba The Hutt's cave, he is a crime lord who rules over the planet Tatooine

rooms.name: Alderaan
rooms.description: You are at Alderaan. You hear this planet is in danger of being destroyed by the Empire

rooms.name: Dagobah
rooms.description: You are on Dagobah, here is the renowned Jedi Master Yoda

rooms.name: Yoda's Forest
rooms.description: You have found Yoda. He tells you you must destroy the Death Star and locate the Jedi Temple on Coruscant to become a Jedi Master

items.itemDescription: The most renowned weapon of a Jedi, use this to defeat enemies that you encounter

rooms.name: Death Star
rooms.description: You're on the death star! This is an imperial weapon capable of destroying rebel planets. There are many stormtroopers here- a weapon may be of use

items.itemDescription: There are plans here that lead to the control room downstairs

rooms.name: Control Room
rooms.description: This is the control room for the Death Star, you can destroy it from here.

rooms.name: Hoth
rooms.description: Here is the rebel base, where you can inform them that the Death Star has been destroyed.

items.itemDescription: The uniform of the rebel alliance members

rooms.name: Naboo
rooms.description: Naboo is a planet home to the Gungans and ruled by very nice queens who know the galaxy's directions very well

items.itemDescription: A map of the planets in the galaxy that lead to Coruscant
After hearing about your bravery on the Death Star, the Queen of Naboo offers you a Jedi cloak

rooms.name: Coruscant
rooms.description: You have reached Coruscant, on this planet is the primary Jedi Temple

rooms.name: Jedi Temple
rooms.description: Congratulations! You've made it to the Jedi Temple where you can become a Jedi Master. Drop your cloak and lightsaber to to prove you are a padawan ready for training
